title: Wire new Sakthi Snacks dish images (Jalebi, Veg Frankie Roll, Veg Momos, Veg Sandwich) as static assets and fallbacks

requirements.summary: Add newly generated static dish images for the four specified Sakthi Snacks menu items under frontend/public/assets/generated using the required filenames.
acceptanceCriteria: The following image files exist under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and render correctly in a browser: `dish-sakthi-jalebi.dim_512x512.png`, `dish-sakthi-vegetable-frankie-roll.dim_512x512.png`, `dish-sakthi-vegetable-momos.dim_512x512.png`, `dish-sakthi-vegetable-sandwich.dim_512x512.png`.

Each generated image visually matches the dish implied by its filename (Jalebi is a syrupy spiral dessert; momos are steamed dumplings; frankie roll is a wrap/roll; vegetable sandwich is a layered sandwich).

file_operations.description: Create the required static asset image for Jalebi at `frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-sakthi-jalebi.dim_512x512.png`.
Create the required static asset image for Vegetable Frankie Roll at `frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-sakthi-vegetable-frankie-roll.dim_512x512.png`.
Create the required static asset image for Vegetable Momos at `frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-sakthi-vegetable-momos.dim_512x512.png`.
Create the required static asset image for Vegetable Sandwich at `frontend/public/assets/generated/dish-sakthi-vegetable-sandwich.dim_512x512.png`.

requirements.summary: Update dish name-to-image mapping so Sakthi Snacks items resolve to the newly generated static dish assets when imageUrl is empty or legacy.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/utils/imageFallbacks.ts`, the `DISH_NAME_TO_IMAGE` entries for `jalebi`, `vegetable frankie roll`, `vegetable momos`, `vegetable momos (6 pcs)`, and `vegetable sandwich` point to the new `/assets/generated/dish-sakthi-*.dim_512x512.png` paths.
When `getDishImageUrl` is called with an empty/legacy `imageUrl` and a matching dish name, it returns the new Sakthi image path rather than the generic dish fallback.

file_operations.description: Update `DISH_NAME_TO_IMAGE` entries for `jalebi`, `vegetable frankie roll`, `vegetable momos`, `vegetable momos (6 pcs)`, and `vegetable sandwich` to point to `/assets/generated/dish-sakthi-jalebi.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/dish-sakthi-vegetable-frankie-roll.dim_512x512.png`, `/assets/generated/dish-sakthi-vegetable-momos.dim_512x512.png`, and `/assets/generated/dish-sakthi-vegetable-sandwich.dim_512x512.png` so `getDishImageUrl` resolves them correctly for empty/legacy imageUrl values.
